Revert™ 700 Total Protein Stain for Western Blot Normalization (250 ml)

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7uggd","text":"Quickly wash cells twice with ice-cold PBS. After the second wash, tilt the dish and completely aspirate all residual PBS. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6dgs2","text":"Immediately add ice-cold lysis buffer, ensuring that the entire surface is covered by lysis buffer.
